name: Goledo
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en: Goledo is a cross-chain lending and borrowing protocol based on Aave. Depositors earn passive income by depositing their digital assets into the algorithmic liquidity market, while both overcollateralized and undercollateralized loans are enabled for borrowers.
